articles.title: Queen Camilla makes a statement in lace dress and diamond earrings worth more than £40,000 - Express
articles.description: Camilla, Queen Consort, has been pictured at the Booker Prize for Fiction ceremony at the Roundhouse, Camden, north London, looking elegant in an all-black outfit.
